RPGUI.SETTINGS.DARKPARTYSHEET_HINT: Selects between original or dark sheet.
RPGUI.SETTINGS.TOKEN_EFFECT_HUD_HINT: Makes effects circular and arranges them outside the token, or on the token ring for larger tokens
RPGUI.SETTINGS.TOKEN_HUD: Disable Dark PF2e Interactive Token Tooltip?
RPGUI.SETTINGS.TOKEN_HUD_HINT: Disables the dark theme of PF2e Interactive Token Tooltip by default theme
RPGUI.SETTINGS.NAVIGATION: Switches the navigation back to horizontal mode
RPGUI.SETTINGS.NAVIGATION_HINT: Use this switch if you are not using Combat Carousel integration
RPGUI.SETTINGS.COMPACT_MODE_HINT: Reduces the size of the left menu and removes the logo
RPGUI.SETTINGS.STANDARD_LOGO_HINT: Returns the standard logo instead of the text logo
RPGUI.SETTINGS.DISABLE_STYLES_HINT: This is a local setting, with which any player can turn off styles
RPGUI.SETTINGS.JOURNAL_SHEET: Disable parchment texture on Journal pages
RPGUI.SETTINGS.JOURNAL_SHEET_HINT: Disable the parchment appearance on journal entries.
RPGUI.SETTINGS.JOURNAL_CURSOR_HINT: Disable RPG Cursor style in Interface.
RPGUI.SETTINGS.CUSTOM_CSS: Disable PF2e style on Journal pages
RPGUI.SETTINGS.CUSTOM_CSS_HINT: Disable all settings and fonts on journal entries to comeback on Foundry style.
RPGUI.SETTINGS.MINIMAL_UI_HINT: Fixes some (not all) of the problems with minimal UI
RPGUI.SETTINGS.HIGHLIGHT_GM_OWNER_TEXT_H: This is a local setting that will highlight text that is only visible to the GM (or owner)
